QuestInfo.fullDiz: I can't just believe what my father told me. I need to see it for myself.
A drunkard from Kordan offered to give me the ananaga making technology if I show him Petro's recipe.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the bartender of Sowth about the Felix's fate

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I bought the medications, now I just have to give them to Ben and hope for the best.
The bartender from Sowth convinced me not to follow Lisa, but to focus on finding Ben. The most logical place to start would be the city of Eastern.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell everything to Lisa and Ben
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that my adventures have come to an end, it's time to share them with Lisa and Ben and decide what I should do next.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kill the raiders who took over the warehouse
Take a chance at Small Land's bar
Tell everything to Lisa and Ben
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that my adventures have come to an end, it's time to share them with Lisa and Ben and decide what I should do next.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Porto about the caravan
Find out who Ben The Throttle is
QuestInfo.fullDiz: My whole life has been turned upside down. To find myself, I have to find my real father, no matter what! The only clue was the name Ben The Throttle. Maybe someone at Sowth had heard of him?

The mechanic at the Eastern was frightened when he found out that Ben The Throttle was an explorer, and told me to look for the village witch, because only she could know where his house is. Sounds crazy, but I had no other clues.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Ben about Ivan and composite
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Midgard master told me that many years ago someone with the initials A and G also ordered armor for the cabin from their shop. Maybe Ben knows where Ivan could obtain such a rare material?

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Become a co-owner of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have an opportunity to become a co-owner of the Colosseum. For my contribution I will get a share of the stock and a steady profit.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the package to the city
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have to take a package to Sowth. The merchant Sergo has some business with my father.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the remnants of the adepts

QuestInfo.fullDiz: There is no way to capture Moska. And if you can't capture something, the best solution is to blow it to hell. That's exactly what we'll do.
We may not have the numerical advantage and significant forces, but hitting Kateberg is the only thing we can do. I hope that fortune will be on our side.
I failed to protect the caravan from Midgard, and now I have to tell the city that the car was destroyed. I hope it won't ruin our relationship.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find the source of the strange noise
QuestInfo.fullDiz: There was some noise coming from the road to the east. Vasily and I decided to check out what was going on.
The Midgard master is taking a great risk by ordering contraband, so I'll have to personally collect the trader's stash in Vaterland.
Now that Marco has talked for me, Grandma has to forgive me.
The Adepts have kidnapped Lisa, and now I have to figure out how to get her out of there. To begin with, I have to understand what their motives are.
I have to give a demonstration battle in the Colosseum to attract the public.
Ben gave me a list of medicines I should buy in Midgard. I hope they will help Lisa wake up.

To help the people of South in the defense of the city, I need to deliver materials to build two pillboxes, which will take the major strike in the battle with the bandits, and then to fight this attack in the first ranks.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver materials to the first point
Deliver materials to the second point

QuestInfo.fullDiz: It is reported that the adepts are raiding the villages of the locals in search of the escaped prisoner. It is most likely that it was Lisa who escaped from them. I must protect those villages and get to Lisa before they do.
They say the archaeologists have found something interesting and quite expensive. They've skimped on security, so I can kidnap their leader and demand their discovery as a ransom.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the prisoner to the hideout
Take Disc ¹2 to the Oracle
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I have the second disk, I can finally decode my father's diary. Of course, to do that I'll have to go to the Oracle in Ignott.
The town %1n asks you to accompany the caravan up to %2n
An inhabitant of %1n asked me defend the transport on his way to %2n and offered to pay %3d.
%1n demands me to accompany the transport carrying an important cargo to %2n. If It will arrive safely, I will get %3d.
The transport from %1n goes to %2n. Some bandits often ambush traders coming that way, so I agreed to protect them for a mere %3d.
The town %1n asks you to destroy the enemy for a reward.
The citizens of %1n are often being attacked by the cunning brigand who always escapes punishment. I agreed to get rid of him for %3d.
I will get %3d, when I get rid of a villain that threatens %1n.
The town %1n will pay %3d coins for each enemy killed.
The local bandit must be cut down to size! The people of %1n will pay %3d for every killed enemy.
The authorities of %1n began to fight for the safety of the trade routes I will be paid %3d for every villain slain.
You must pay %3d percents of your money for %2b to redeem your evil deeds.
The town %1n asks you to deliver package to %2n
I’ll get %3d, when I deliver the package to %2n. Somebody is waiting for it, but I am not going to hurry for such a small amount on money.
Some crank from %1n will pay me %3d, if I go and say hello to his friend living in %2n.
Tell about the opening of the Colosseum to the citizens of Eastern.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the beginning of the revolution to Astria
Meet the Heretic at the monastery

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Church of Enlightment must be overthrown from its reigning throne.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the beginning of the revolution in Saraevo

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Because of my careless actions in the past, bandits from the Brigade took over Pesht. I must help the traders to recapture it.

As soon as I came out of the tunnel, I was immediately attacked by an unknown person, and after I defeated him, he suggested that I go to their headquarters. I definitely need to figure out what exactly is going on here.
The top CIT leaders are on the defensive in Rotorsk. We need to go there and attack the city.
I got lucky: Ben The Throttle lives nearby. I have to meet him and find out how he's connected to me and recent events.
Now that I can't go to Midgard, I have to find another way to find out about Ben's place. Maybe the village near Midgard can help me?
There's one last village I haven't been to yet. I think someone needs help there, too.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Volozh about suspicious travelers
Find the way to the snowy lands
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Most likely the path to the snowy lands must begin somewhere in Hel, and I know only one person in the region who might know something about it. It's time to visit Homer again, but it might be a good idea to stop by Sharky's before.
Homer is probably drinking in a bar in one of the fishing villages. It won't be hard to find him.
Markyzych told me that Homer is fishing not far from Saliniom. I should look along the coast.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Look for Homer along the coast
Give Homer a ride to Saliniom
Pick up stuff from an abandoned village

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I have arrived in the Mountains of the Wise, I need to find out where the wise men live.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask about the Wise Men in Ermakovo

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I can't believe my dad let me go into town alone. I have to get his truck out of the garage before he changes his mind!
Finally this man will tell me what the hell is going on here.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the leader of the Fishermen
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Fishermen have taken over the storage. If I release their leader from the prison, they'll let me take everything I need to travel to Lidencloud.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out in Olme where the leader is being held
Intercept a transport with a leader
Take the leader to his fighters
Search for warm clothes in the storage

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now I have a composite, so there's nothing keeping me in these ice-covered lands anymore.
I have to tell Vsevolod that Dobroslava will not return to him. I hope he won't kill me on the spot after hearing this.
Now that we've managed to get some warm clothes, only a stone blockage separates me from the place where the composite can be found.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Clear the entrance to the tunnel

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that nothing else prevents me from crossing the bridge, I must go to the wise men and find out from them where I can find the composite.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa at Moska's Bar
Evacuate the locals and go to the Wise Men
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that the adepts have left Lidencloud, it is necessary to evacuate the locals.
Bandits are harassing archaeological scientists who are excavating nearby. I have agreed to protect them from the attacks of bandits who are attempting to steal the treasures they have found.
In order to gain the trust of the wise men, I need to help three people from different places.
The adepts made me a condition that they would only let Lisa go and open the bridge if I helped them to eliminate the locals. I agreed.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet locals in a designated area
Destroy the last local resistance forces
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The executioner in Moska managed to squeeze out information about military equipment and the location of the villages of the locals from the Velimir's daughter.
Kill the tank men who attacked Gloohoe.
Tikhomir will not be able to fool me! I will kill him, and bring Dobroslava home safe and sound.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Help organize the work of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The businessmen want to reopen the Colosseum. Unfortunately, their advertising budget is obscenely small. And they don't have a lot of experience. But I still agreed to help them in this difficult matter.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet Axel at the appointed place

QuestInfo.fullDiz: In addition to Rinolsk, there is another town whose residents need help.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out what happened in La Belle
Pull the bodies of the dead miners from under the rubble
Fight off the first wave of attackers
Fight off the second wave of attackers
Fight off the third wave of attackers
Fight off the fourth wave of attackers
Fight off the fifth wave of attackers

QuestInfo.fullDiz: There is only one challenge left that separates me from the composite.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the Volozh bar
Talk to Lisa in the Sowth's bar
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The mysterious girl asked me to show her the countryside. It is necessary to talk to her before deciding anything.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Ben where Lisa might be hiding
QuestInfo.fullDiz: After Pesht, the Lisa's trail vanishes. I should ask Ben where she might be hiding.
Lisa has stolen my father's disk! It is urgent to find her before the trail goes cold. She could not have left these lands without passing through the Pesht, so I should start the search from there.
In Zarmek, I stumbled upon a car wreck with an extremely familiar logo. I need to take a closer look at this car.
Tell about the Colosseum in Midgard. They will surely be glad to hear about the appearance of the new entertainment center.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Olme about the Sea Gate
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Olme is the last traders' town in the North. Maybe people there know something about the Sea Gate.
That's a hell of a thing. I don't know if I've ever seen anything like that...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check the place that Mr. Hat pointed out
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Maybe I'm going crazy, but I met a mysterious headless man in a bar who pointed out to me a place I should visit. It's very silly, but I'll go there.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check out the place Mr. Hat was talking about
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The man without a head keeps following me. He wants me to go to another place and visit a mysterious cavern. I'm not sure if I need it...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Check the place that Mr. Hat pointed out
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I'm getting pretty tired of wandering around and doing tasks for this fabulous creature, but something tells me that I need to find out what's out there.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Mr. Hat under the mountain in Librium
QuestInfo.fullDiz: How did he even get there?
I think it's a good idea to try my luck in a big city first. I'm sure there's someone there who needs my help.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in the city if they need help
Find out what happened in La Belle
You didn't have medicine for Odette.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Perhaps if you had had a box of medications, things might have gone differently?

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out about the composite at the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Salvatore is going to slip into Midgard and erase the information about me. In the meantime, I can do another, equally useful thing.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask Salvatore about the success of the break-in
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The night has passed and Salvatore is already back. I should ask him how it went.
In all of Ridzin, I know only one person capable of sneaking into a major city with serious security and stealing what I need.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Wait for the end of the interrogation
Talk to the head of security in Marezzia
Ask the oilman what to do next
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that all the old men are dead, I have no more clues about Ivan's fate. The only thing left is to go back to the oilman.
Now that the evacuation route is known, it is worth informing the oilman immediately. I hope the locals have not yet discovered his hiding place.
Of the two of us, only Lisa's car is able to pass through the enormous gate that separates me from the lands of Lidencloud.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver Tuzz refugees to anti-militarist transport
Save civilians from being sent to war
QuestInfo.fullDiz: In Tuzz and Marezzia there goes a real hunt for ordinary citizens and undesirable figures. I cannot stop this madness, but I can try to save as many people as possible.
I need to apologize to Grandma for calling her a witch. But how can I do that if she won't open the door for me? I'll ask at the bar.
Tell about the Colosseum in Porto. Soon people from all the big cities will flock there for the entertainment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the rebel leader to Marezzia

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have found Ben.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deal with the signs in the fields
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Even lands as remote as the Mountains of the Wise have not been unaffected by the mysterious phenomenon of signs in the fields.
Now that the Church of Enlightment no longer rules Argen, the war is in fact over. All that remains is to return to headquarters with a report.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the owner of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I've kept my part of the bargain. Now I have to get the reward I deserve.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the owner of the Colosseum
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I've kept my part of the bargain. Now I have to get the reward I deserve.
Now that all the truth has been revealed to me, there is only one step left. I am ready for it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give a ride to the fisherman to Olme
QuestInfo.fullDiz: A fisherman from Saliniom wants me to give him a ride to Olme, where he would be able to join the guards for the trade caravans.
The Velimir's daughter went to an abandoned factory to look for parts for boat engines and hasn't returned yet. I should check if the adepts got to her.
People complain about the appearance of mysterious signs in the fields. I need to get to the bottom of this.
Before going to Severka, Serafima wants to collect some things from her house. I hope it's something really important.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the spy to the base

QuestInfo.fullDiz: People complain about the appearance of mysterious signs in the fields. Perhaps there is some logic in this phenomenon.
Now that my search is over, all business should be completed and then I should dive into a boring and relaxed life.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Ben and Lisa about the upcoming trip
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I got all the necessary materials for the master in Midgard, and he got to work. Now I need a way to pass the time. I think I'll stop by Ben's place.
I don't know what could have caused this strange phenomenon. Scientists in Midgard can figure out what's really going on here.
Before I go into the desert, I'd like to stop at Sowth and see how things are going there.
I didn't feel like risking my life and going to Sowth on my own. I'd rather pay a local mercenary, Vasily.
It's a good time to go home after a successful deal.

According to the book that Ivan gave to the Bukharians, I will find all the answers to my questions near the iron bird that fell somewhere on the swamps of Hel. I should have a better look around that area.
I should stop by a one village in Hel. Who knows, maybe I'll meet someone I know there.
The adepts have captured the Velimir's daughter and are going to interrogate her in an abandoned factory. I have to go there and get the information we need.
The traders' storage, which contains the warm clothes I need, has been occupied by the locals. There must be some way to drive them out.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the CIT troops near the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: When the CIT forces on the border will be defeated, the security protocol will be triggered. This will allow us to eliminate all the top commanders at once.
A citizen of Locus agreed to justify me in the eyes of Grandma if I will deliver a parcel to his friend in Yar.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give Grandma Paula a gift from Ben
Talk to bartender Dronn in the Sowth
Help traders clear out the storage
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I gave up the idea of attacking the traders' prison caravan, and now I have to help them clean out the storage. Only then will I have access to the contents of the warehouse.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Pick up warm clothes from the storage
Drive the rich farmer to the gas station
QuestInfo.fullDiz: A local, gnarly businessman asked me to take him to a gas station. I agreed, reluctantly.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet the trader's army near the bandit base
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The leader of the trader's army suspended the mopping-up operation so that I could participate myself. I need to meet them at the arranged location
With the kind of fire support the traders gave me, I should be able to clear out the bandit base and get my father's disk back.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report the success of the operation to the colonel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The operation of taking over the military base was successful, now I have to go back to Minin and report to the colonel.
Colonel Gibbons told me that Minin's caravanner wants to tell me something.
I am sure the protection for the cabin is ready, now all that's left is to mount it on my truck.
There is information that the CD are going to attack a humanitarian aid caravan. It is my responsibility to prevent this.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to the bartender in Asgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Apparently, the inhabitants of this town know how to get through the mountains to the west.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Come to the bar and say the password
Ask the Asgard bartender about other shops with explosive
Buy explosives in the mining village
Repulse the attack of the bandits

QuestInfo.fullDiz: My job is to ensure the safety of the transport. The cargo must be delivered at any cost.
Now I have the explosives. All that's left is to mine the bridge.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the oil derrick from the bandits
Find and destroy the bandit camp
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The last enemy escapes. I can follow him to the bandit base and destroy this evil nest.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy all bandits in the base
Ben was last seen in Midgard
Find the entrance to the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now I know where the tunnel is. I hope that there won't be any difficulty in getting through it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Ben in his house
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Soon I will see Ben The Throttle and find out the truth about my identity.
Most likely, he has a key to the tunnel, and he can sell it. Well, if I understand the laws of the market correctly...

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Catch up with Lisa in Helvetia
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Capture Lisa in Helvetia.
On a distant northern island, it is rumored, lives the Oracle. The trail my father left behind leads there.
My father may still be alive! I will dedicate my life to finding him.|I think I should start by visiting his house in Minin.

The barmaid at Celja told me that in addition to the CIT and CD, there is a third party who wants to resolve the conflict without bloodshed. They say they have settled somewhere in the north. Maybe I should look for their base?
The Crimson Dawn is looking for new fighters. Becoming one of them is a chance to get closer to Axel.
The Independent Towns need help in their fight against Axel. Together we can crush the tyrant.
Somewhere far to the north is the Sea Gate. A caravan from Minin will show me the right way.
Workers from the oil derrick are sitting in Minin's bar. I need to negotiate with them to get them back to work.
Surely sooner or later someone will come out of the tunnel. That's who I'm going to expropriate the key from. The main thing is to wait.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Follow the caravan to the village of Gendenburgsk

QuestInfo.fullDiz: So far, the CD has been getting resources and recruits through the tunnel. By capturing it, the CIT will cut off an important artery to the invaders. To do this, I will have to kill all the guards.
My actions have been appreciated and I will be presented to the CIT High command.
The moment of truth is near. Soon I would be able to look Axel in the eyes.
In order for the people of Pesht to allow me to pass through, I must eliminate the threat of an attack by the bandits. The easiest way to do this is to blow up the bridge leading to their base.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the oil derrick from the bandits
QuestInfo.fullDiz: To travel farther north, I need to establish oil production. Then I can travel with the trader's caravan.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Enlist the support of a large clan
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Bad news. Lisa is the girlfriend of some local authority. I don't think I can get to him alone. I'll have to look for allies.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Collect money to pay for bridge passage
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The bandits agree to let me through their territory for 10000 coins.
Small settlements are constantly attacked by the thugs of the Crimson Dawn. I can prevent an attack, and I will do so.
A surviving bandit told me that the mayor himself was involved in the takeover of the oil derrick. I need to follow him to confirm this suspicion.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Destroy the car from the tunnel
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The surveillance failed. Now I need to destroy this car.
After a long conversation with Lisa at the bar, I agreed to show her the area.
After a long conversation with Lisa at the bar, I agreed to show her the area.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Meet the leader of the resistance

QuestInfo.fullDiz: And here is an opportunity to get close to Axel. I must meet with the rebels in Toskana and find out everything they can tell me.
Now that the oil derrick is finally working, I'll be able to drive further north.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take employees to the oil derrick
QuestInfo.fullDiz: As soon as I bring the workers to the oil derrick, they'll start working right away. That means that my trip up north will happen very soon.
I need to find the entrance to the underwater tunnel that leads to Oracle Island.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the rebel's leader to Tuzz
QuestInfo.fullDiz: After all that has happened, the leader of the rebels is simply obliged to report important information.
Operation was successfully completed. I managed to capture the CD general. In Rotorsk he will be forced to tell everything he knows.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take workers to the oil derrick
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now the workers are the masters of their own destiny. And they agreed to work on the oil derrick again.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Open the tunnel with the key
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have the key to the tunnel. All that remains is to open it.
My first assignment is to patrol the border to look for enemy vehicles.
Surely in the next village I can make a deal with the workers. For a small salary they would certainly agree to work in the mine.
After a good drinking, Petro decided it was time to punish the bandit who had been mistreating the local girls. I must help him do it!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return with transport to Tuzz and report

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Go back to Tuzz

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Try to cross the river elsewhere
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to get to the other side of the river. It can only be done in Pesht or in bandit territory...
I can follow the car out of the tunnel and try to get the key when the driver comes out.
Wherever the murderer is hiding, I will find him and punish him for his crimes!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to the warehouse in Midgard

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Along with several CIT vehicles, I have to capture the CD General.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out about the Sea Gate
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Someone in Minin probably knows about the Sea Gate.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to the bar to Sharky
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Since the mayor of Minin is not interested in solving the city's problems, I'll have to talk to Sharky again.
At last I can fight Lisa in a fair duel!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Drive up to the ruins in Vaterland
Take the spy out of CD's hands
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Scouts report that one of the anti-militarist men has been exposed and is being searched for all over Argen. I must go there immediately and rescue him.
Filimon is probably drinking at a bar in one of the fishing villages. Or maybe not...
I have found Filimon, now all that's left is to bring him home.
The drunkard from Calis told me that Filimon had gone out to do roundels around the spruce on the Sacred Hill.
A woman asked me to bring her husband home. He's a little out of it, and he likes to have a drink or two.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Inform scientists in Midgard about the signs

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The druid said there are some strange signs on his field. It's worth seeing what he meant by that.
The lonely druid probably misses his friends. I need to give him a present from an old mate.
I wonder where I can get rarities? Maybe I should look in the ruins of the hospital?
The old soldier talked a lot. In my opinion, information about botany is the only thing he said on the case.
I was told that there's an abandoned hospital nearby. I think there might be something interesting.
Despite the fact that the Colosseum did not have the material I needed, I could not refuse the offered fight at the Arena.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the master in Midgard about the failure
Talk to the master in Midgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that the way to Midgard is open, I can finally get my truck ready for the harsh Desert environment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the old archaeologist to the ruins of the Old World
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The old man asked me to take him to the ruins where he could do his research.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the old archaeologist to Midgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to take the old archaeologist I already know to Midgard, where he will share his discoveries with his colleagues.
On the way to Vaterland, I suddenly remembered dropping off an old archaeologist at the old ruins. I wonder if he's still there.
I have to take the strange young family home. And still there is something suspicious about them...
The Entertainment Center is a paradise, if the advertising slogans of the Pesht's bartender don't lie.
My eyes were opened: the Oracle is insane. He is trying to destroy the Source and all its secrets. But I will not let that happen!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the second disc from the thief
QuestInfo.fullDiz: This thief doesn't know who he's messing with! The disk will be mine at any cost. Only the death of one of us can solve this problem.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out who broke into father's house
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Everything in my father's house has been turned upside down. Maybe one of the people saw what happened here. I'll have to ask at the bar.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out where the Gate is

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Lisa stole the amulet and the disks! I must find her before she disappears completely.

Now that I have both CDs, I can finally learn about my father's fate. I hope the contents of the diary will help me follow in his footsteps. Of course, that would require going to Ignotte to see the Oracle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Catch a fugitive in an abandoned city
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The people of the Forgotten will pay me if I kill the leader of the bandits who destroyed the local Entertainment Center.
The Oracle must know where to find a weapon powerful enough to destroy the Overlord. This terrible place must be burned out for a hundred kilometers around it!
Most likely, the thief is hiding out at Base 51. He'll try to sell the stolen goods where the scum of the earth gather.
I must hurry! I need to find out in Asgard about the tunnel where Lisa went.
The path to the Gate is blocked by a swamp, I need to find a shallow place or a path to get to the other side.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Report on Bratislav to the Supreme Wise Man
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I spent half a day digging waist-deep in the snow, only to find out later that the "vital" aggregate was a regular ananaga moonshiner.
A quite strange man from Rinolsk asked me to find three hidden parts for some machine he vitally needed.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Wait for Bratislav to make his best ananaga
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It turned out that Bratislav needed parts to repair his ananaga moonshiner, and he was hiding it from me because he was afraid of the Supreme Wise Man's wrath. I agreed not to report on him away if he would make ananaga according to my recipes.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Do other things while Bratislav is making ananaga

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Someone has stolen a valuable masterpiece, a piece of ancient art, from Aesthete. The thread leads to a certain art connoisseur.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the masterpiece from the Rogue
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The person responsible for all this trouble is a certain Rogue. I must find him and take away the masterpiece. By force, if necessary.
To get the award, I have to return the masterpiece to Aesthetes. But why give it back exactly to him, though? After all, there is another interested person.
Njeri's device will be able to block the deadly radiation of the Source. But only if I install it in close range of it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Try to drive through the Vaterland
Get to Vahat by the sea

QuestInfo.fullDiz: An alien battleship appeared from nowhere. It is the one who emits the waves that block the Oracle's signals. The enemy must be destroyed for the sake of humanity.
A mafia boss can cause me a lot of trouble if he finds out I stole his merchandise. I should kill him before that happens.
What a chance! Due to a malfunction in the station, the aliens revealed the location of their base. Now I can talk to them.
Somewhere in the surrounding area of this power plant city is a source of emissions that is blocking the Oracle's signals. It is necessary to find out what we are dealing with.
There will soon be a transport to the south of here with a load of goods to sell for a profit. It will try to pass undetected, but not for me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Pretend to be a resistance fighter
QuestInfo.fullDiz: My task is to get into the resistance, pretending to be a CIT agent. I know the password. That should be enough.
It's time to go back to Marezzia for the reward and for a new assignment.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Turn to the side of the Crimson Dawn
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Instead of trying to get the spy out of the heat of the war, I decided that it would be much easier to bring him to Axel and get the information I needed firsthand.
My task is to destroy the transport. Anything I can steal is mine.
Felix got in my way again. This time I won't spare him!
I will fight Axel in the arena and force him to tell me everything I want.
They told me at the monastery that not long ago, Lisa left Arzhan for the power plant in Sel. I must hurry before she runs away from me again!
There is something suspicious in the simple task of bringing wine from a monastery...
It's time to start a psychological attack. First I have to destroy some of the CIT patrol cars.
The inhabitants of this village have been seen to have links with the enemy. I will attack it in order to draw the CIT forces away from the front line.
The abbess of the monastery suggested me to hunt down heretics. Why not?
The rebel leader must stay alive. He can give us important information about the enemy's plans.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Kill the CIT leaders during negotiations
QuestInfo.fullDiz: If I end this war, I'll probably get my reward from Axel's hands.
It's time to get my reward from Axel's hands. This is my only chance to get close to him within shooting distance.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the junk to a nearby village
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It's a dandy job to move cargo from one place to another. It's not very exciting, but I get paid good money for it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the junk back to Marezzia
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The situation with the transportation of the old engine becomes interesting. No sooner had I given it away in the village than they returned it to me with a request to bring it back to Marezzia.
It's time to go back to Marezzia for the reward and for a new assignment.
It's time to go back to Marezzia for the reward and for a new assignment.
My order is to kill the defenseless rebels. I am troubled by doubts, for this is a real cruelty.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out about Lisa in the Monastery
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Last I heard, Lisa was hiding in the Monastery. That's where I'll get her!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell about the signs in Midgard
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Scientists in Midgard would be interested in such information. I might even be able to make some money from it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take a look at the field
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It's worth looking at what scares farmers on the fields.
To win the trust of the druids, I must free their sanctuary from the Steel Monsters

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bury the exit from the monsters' lair

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The people I met were very unfriendly. I must look for other settlements where I would be better welcomed.
This is my first time in these lands. I need to find the locals and ask them where to find the Oracle.
This is my first time in these lands. I need to find the locals and ask them where to find the Oracle.
I finally managed to find my way to the Oracle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out what happened to Uluk
QuestInfo.fullDiz: There has been no news from Uluk for a long time. The druids ask me to find out what happened to its inhabitants.
Machine-worshippers want to overthrow the Druids and gain control under the island. That is why they want to kill the Supreme Druid. If I help them, I will find out how to get to the Oracle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Drive with druid to the ambush site

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Not everyone in Uluk has joined the machine religion. Those who have remained loyal to the Druid faith are being repressed. I just can't leave them to their certain deaths.
The High Druid lives in Set. Most likely, he knows where to find the Oracle.
The diary shed light on my father's fate. Now I know for sure that I should look for him on the other side of the Desert of Death.
The defenders of the Oracle will let me pass if the monster is killed. As proof, I must bring its head.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find the City of the Dead

QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems that the Oracle is not at all as omniscient as he used to be. To get his memory back, I need to take the robo-repairers to the marked locations.
In the way of the Oracle there are his guards, it is necessary to overcome this obstacle.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Prepare for a trip to the desert
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The car needs to be upgraded so that I can use it to cross the desert. I have a blueprint, so I need to find a master who will do the work.
Perhaps the second disk is at my father's house. I might have missed something when I was there the first time, but now I know exactly what to look for.
Now that it is clear where my father has gone, it is time to go back to Lisa and discuss with her our future plans.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring four artifacts to the Oracle
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Oracle agreed to help me, but only if I bring him four artifacts from the abandoned factory.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask about the driver in Alikham
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The missing ferryman from Kef was last seen near the village of Alikham. I think I should start the search from there.
At Kef they told me that the old men were last seen in the old ship cemetery. Finally I would know where Ivan was going!
I managed to cross the Desert of Death! Now it would be nice to find a workshop. I can only hope that not all of the locals are aggressive.
Strange people live in this desert. I can't get anything out of them. I need to find someone who can answer my questions.
My father went in that direction - nothing else is known. I'll follow him and find out the truth about his fate.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to the derrick for oil

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to tell the people of Kef that they will never see the oil engineer again.
Without oil, the people of Kef are like without hands. I will help them bring a load of oil. Anyway, I have nothing to do before the expedition returns.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Gadad
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems like Lisa has something to say to me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Kef
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I need to convince Lisa that it would be safer for her to stay in town rather than coming with me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Lisa in the bar of Kef
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It seems like Lisa has something to say to me.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Evacuate the people of Bukhara to the port

QuestInfo.fullDiz: If I help these people escape persecution, I can count on their help.
Lisa had recognized my stepfather's killers: they were the men in the tanks who live in Kef. We need to follow them.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the blocker to the downed ship
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Njeri's device will be able to block the deadly radiation of the Source. But only if I install it in close range of it.
The alien ship is the source of the radiation that destroyed our world. It must be destroyed!

All traces point to a military base. I need to take a good look around. But I don't think these guys are friendly. Even if it's a wrong way to go, at least I'll clear this place of the madmen terrorizing the country.
Sergo asked me to take a look around before he tells me the truth about my father. Well, I can look around, I'm in no hurry.
I hope Lisa wakes up if I take her out of the desert.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Sergo about the Source
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I saw this horrible place and could barely get my feet away. A terrible force pulled me straight to the heart of the radiation. There, where the paralyzed people were already standing. I must do something! Perhaps Sergo knows how to stop this madness.
